vmassol - (13:45): sdumitriu: hi. Do you know if http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-2286 is fixed?  
sdumitriu - (13:49): I don't know  
vmassol - (13:50): ok, I'll need to try it then  
vmassol - (13:56): hmm I'm not a big fan of the layout for the new watchlist  
vmassol - (13:56): two much space is wasted in the left column IMO  
vmassol - (13:57): I also wonder if forcing the user to edit to see what can be modified may not be obvious for users  
CalebJamesDeLisl joined #xwiki at 14:06  
vmassol left at 14:39 (Client Quit  
aaao joined #xwiki at 16:12  
aaao - (16:14): I updated from XWiki 2.0.2 to 2.1.1. I deployed the new WAR file. Now I want also to update the XAR. But I can't login because there is no login link on the start page anymore.  
aaao - (16:24): With Firefox I can use: View, Page Style, No Style. Then I see the login link. :-)  
sdumitriu - (16:27): It could be a cached style issue  
sdumitriu - (16:27): You can Shift+Refresh to force a cache refresh  
aaao - (16:30): Too late. Can't test it anymore. Already imported the XAR and now everything looks good. :-)  
aaao - (16:32): Is there a way to disable the icons?  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 16:42  
sdumitriu - (16:58): Which icons?

CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:25): I can't save user pages... "Field users in object XWiki.Admin has an invalid name"  Going to wipe the db and try from a fresh import...  
sdumitriu - (21:27): Could be caused by Vincent's refactoring  
vmassol - (21:27): CalebJamesDeLisl: are you sure you're up to date re svn?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:27): As of yesterday.  
vmassol - (21:27): should be ok then  
vmassol - (21:28): how can I reproduce?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:28): Edit your user page, click save and view.  
vmassol - (21:28): trying  
vmassol - (21:30): working fine  
vmassol - (21:30): here's what I did:  
sdumitriu - (21:30): wfm  
vmassol - (21:30): go to my user page  
vmassol - (21:30): edit (using new profile)  
vmassol - (21:30): change about section  
vmassol - (21:30): save  
vmassol - (21:31): CalebJamesDeLisl: there error you have is one that I fixed  
vmassol - (21:31): but I fixed it 2-3 days ago  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:31): I guess my svn is older than I thought.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:31): Good that it's fixed.  
vmassol - (21:41): sdumitriu: what would be nice too for comments is the ability to edit them from the view display  
sdumitriu - (21:43): Yeah
